sqlMap.select:
select id, name, type, category, npc_offer, npc_end, dialog_start, dialog_ongoing, dialog_end, condition_sect, condition_level, condition_fame, condition_item, repeat_times, bonus_fame, bonus_exp, bonus_copper, bonus_skill, extra_condition_time, extra_skill, extra_fame, extra_exp, extra_copper, mission_id, pre_mission_id, description, city_id, is_validate, cityfacility_id, area_id, in_team, pre_mission_state, condition_time_limit, condition_team_size, condition_time_range, condition_level_end from raw_mission
order by $orderByClause$

select id, name, type, category, npc_offer, npc_end, dialog_start, dialog_ongoing, dialog_end, condition_sect, condition_level, condition_fame, condition_item, repeat_times, bonus_fame, bonus_exp, bonus_copper, bonus_skill, extra_condition_time, extra_skill, extra_fame, extra_exp, extra_copper, mission_id, pre_mission_id, description, city_id, is_validate, cityfacility_id, area_id, in_team, pre_mission_state, condition_time_limit, condition_team_size, condition_time_range, condition_level_end from raw_mission where id = #id:INTEGER#
